metadata.title: CVE-2020-8694

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 12

metadata.description: Insufficient access control in the Linux kernel driver for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.
